name: Azrael's Journey
description:
A small prototype for a Zelda-inspired game I've been planning to make. The game stars Azrael, an angel banished for his arrogance who needs to perform labors in order to regain his powers. The demo includes a short dungeon where the player needs to find keys in order to progress further.

Controls:

WASD: Move

K: Melee Attack, Confirm

J:  Ranged Attack (Costs Magic)

Hold K until the player flashes to perform a Charge Attack

Face the direction of a projectile without attacking to passively block it.
